name: Strawberry Freezer Jam
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: Prepare fruit. Measure sugar into bowl (exact measure). Stir sug- ar into fruit. Set aside for 10 minutes; stirring occasionally. Stir box sure-jell and water in small saucepan. Bring mixture to full boil on high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 1 minute. Remove from heat. Stir Sure-Jell mixture into fruit. Stir until sugar is completely dissolved and no longer grainy, about 3 minutes. Pour quickly into clean freezer jars or plastic containers. Let stand 24 hours, then freeze.
